titleStmt.title: By the King, A proclamation. James R. Whereas the Parliament is prorogued to the twelfth day of January next, and that we have thought fit to prorogue the same for a further time; ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
James II, King of England, 1633-1701.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook the assignee of Benjamin Tooke, printer to the King's most excellent Majesty, and are to be sold by Andrew Crook at his Majesty's Printing-house on Ormonde-Key.,

notesStmt.note: Title from caption title and opening lines of text.
"Given at our court at our Castle of Dublin the 27th day of December. 1689."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
